2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>WHEN <break time='200ms'/> WE <break time='200ms'/> ARE <break time='200ms'/> TOGETHER <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: Sasantha visited his best friend Ram during the school vacation. He played cricket with Ram and his brother, Shyam. Ram's mother, Savithri served them some snacks and tea.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sasant̪a'>Sasantha</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> visited <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> best <break time='200ms'/> friend <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːm'>Ram</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> during <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> vacation. <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> played <break time='200ms'/> cricket <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːm'>Ram</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> brother, <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ʃjaːm'>Shyam</phoneme>. <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːm'>Ram</phoneme>'s <break time='200ms'/> mother, <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='saːvit̪ri'>Savithri</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> served <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> some <break time='200ms'/> snacks <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> tea. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: <break time='200ms'/> Boys! <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> tea <break time='200ms'/> time. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.text: Ram: OK, mother. Give us five minutes. It's the last over.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='raːm'>Ram</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> OK, <break time='200ms'/> mother. <break time='200ms'/> Give <break time='200ms'/> us <break time='200ms'/> five <break time='200ms'/> minutes. <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> last <break time='200ms'/> over. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Mother: Come soon children. Otherwise the Vadai will get cold.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother: <break time='200ms'/> Come <break time='200ms'/> soon <break time='200ms'/> children. <break time='200ms'/> Otherwise <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='vəɖeː'>Vadai</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> will <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> cold. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.text: Sasantha: Vadai? I love them, but we buy it from a café. Does aunty make them at home? Shyam: Yes. She makes the best Vadai in the world…don't you mother?
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='sasant̪a'>Sasantha</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='vəɖeː'>Vadai</phoneme>? <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> love <break time='200ms'/> them, <break time='200ms'/> but <break time='200ms'/> we <break time='200ms'/> buy <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> café. <break time='200ms'/> Does <break time='200ms'/> aunty <break time='200ms'/> make <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> home? <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='ʃjaːm'>Shyam</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> Yes. <break time='200ms'/> She <break time='200ms'/> makes <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> best <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='vəɖeː'>Vadai</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> world…don't <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> mother? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
